text: Silver End is a small village in England. It is in Essex, between the towns of Braintree and Witham. It was started by Francis Henry Crittall, who wanted it to be a model village. Crittall started a factory in Silver End for his company, Crittall Windows Ltd. The factory made parts for metal windows. In 2001, there were 3,861 people living in Silver End. == References == Category:Villages in Essex Category:Civil parishes in Essex
title: Silver End
